aiReason: While culturally interesting, this is primarily a museum/archive story with limited direct relevance to Lman's core expertise in AI/LLM, Web3, startups, and privacy tech. No clear business or technology angle that would resonate with his audience. Generic digital archival project lacks the innovation or critical tech angle Lman typically covers.
suggestedAngle: If covering: Focus on how AI/LLMs could enhance digital archives and historical research - but the article doesn't explore this. Better to skip unless there's a unique tech infrastructure or AI application angle.
